articles.author: Jennifer Palmieri
articles.title: Why Michigan’s primary is a key election for Biden, Trump ahead of November
articles.description: The first primary in a general election battleground will give us some clues about Donald Trump’s and Joe Biden’s weaknesses ahead of their likely rematch in 2024.
articles.content: We know who will win Michigan Tuesday night, but not how theyll do it, and that will be the interesting part. While both former President Donald Trump and President Joe Biden will undoubtedly win the… [+1918 chars]

articles.title: Trump’s classified documents handling is much worse than Biden’s, Jack Smith notes
articles.description: The classified documents claims against Trump don’t compare to those against Biden. Still, Trump’s lawyers have raised the ill-fitting comparison to Judge Aileen Cannon.

articles.title: Jon Stewart's 'Daily Show' episode on Israel-Hamas never stood a chance
articles.description: Jon Stewart used his third Daily Show episode to half-heartedly present an action plan to resolve the Israel-Hamas conflict.
